message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_PURPOSE_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Audit Purpose must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_PRIORITY_NOT_SET
message.locale: An Audit Priority must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_USER_ACCESS_NOT_SET
message.locale: A User Access level must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_FEEDBACK_ON_NEGATIVE_FINDINGS_NOT_APPLICABLE
message.locale: Feedback on Negative Findings is only applicable where the Case Owner Access is set to 'View Findings and Provide Feedback'.

message.name: ERR_FV_SCHEDULED_START_DATE_TOO_BIG
message.locale: The Scheduled Start Date must not be after the Scheduled End Date.

message.name: ERR_FV_COMMENTS_LONG
message.locale: Comment entered exceeds the maximum length, it should not be longer than '%1n' characters.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_COORDINATOR_NOT_SET
message.locale: A coordinator must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CANNOT_SELECT_FEEDBACK_IND
message.locale: Feedback indicator should only be set if the user involvement is 'View Findings & Provide Feedback'.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_CANCELLED_AUDIT_PLAN
message.locale: This audit plan has already been canceled and cannot be modified.
This audit plan has already been cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_REMOVE_AUDIT_PLAN
message.locale: This audit plan has already been canceled and cannot be removed.
This audit plan has already been cancelled and cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_PURPOSE_STATUS_NOT_PENDING
message.locale: Purpose can only be modified if the audit plan status is Pending.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_USER_ACCESS_STATUS_NOT_PENDING
message.locale: User Involvement can only be modified if the audit plan status is Pending.

message.name: ERR_RV_CANNOT_MODIFY_COMPLETE_AUDIT_PLAN
message.locale: This audit plan has already been completed and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_COORD_BADUSER
message.locale: The Coordinator must have a Role Name of '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_FV_MANDATORY_AUDIT_CASE_CONFIG_NOT_SET
message.locale: An audit plan must be associated with an Audit Case Config record.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CANNOT_CANCEL_AUDITPLAN_UNLESS_STATUS_PENDING
message.locale: An audit plan can only be canceled when the status is 'Pending'.
An audit plan can only be cancelled when the status is 'Pending'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SCHEDULED_START_DATE_REQUIRED_FOR_INPROGRESS
message.locale: A scheduled start date must be specified before a case audit can be assigned.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SCHEDULED_END_DATE_REQUIRED_FOR_INPROGRESS
message.locale: A scheduled end date must be specified before a case audit can be assigned.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_AUDITS_MUST_BE_COMPLETE_BEFORE_COMPLETION
message.locale: All case audits must be complete before setting the status to 'Completed'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_AUDIT_PLAN_FINDINGS_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_BEFORE_COMPLETION
message.locale: Audit Plan summary findings must be complete before setting the status to 'Completed'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_TEXT_FOR_AUDIT_PLAN_FINDINGS_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Some text for Audit Plan summary findings must be entered before saving.

message.name: ERR_XRV_FOCUS_AREA_REQUIRED_FOR_INPROGRESS
message.locale: An audit plan must be associated with a focus area.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CASE_AUDITS_REQUIRED_FOR_INPROGRESS
message.locale: At least one case audit must be specified before setting the status to 'In Progress'.

message.name: ERR_XFV_CASE_AUDITS_MUST_BE_ASSIGNED_FOR_INPROGRESS
message.locale: At least one case audit must be assigned before setting the status to 'In Progress'.

message.name: ERR_XRV_CANNOT_MODIFY_AUDIT_PLAN_INVALID_USER
message.locale: Audit plan details can only be modified by the coordinator assigned to the audit plan.

message.name: ERR_AUDIT_PLAN_CANNOT_DELETE_SCHEDULE
message.locale: The schedule cannot be removed when the Audit Plan is 'In Progress'.

message.name: ERR_AUDIT_PLAN_INVALID_STATE_FOR_PENDING
message.locale: An audit plan cannot be moved back into the 'Pending' state.

message.name: ERR_AUDIT_PLAN_INVALID_STATE_TO_COMPLETE
message.locale: The Audit Plan is not yet in progress and therefore cannot be completed.
